SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT s.`ID` AS ShareID,s.`User_ID`,s.`Source_ID`,s.`Source_Type`,s.ShareUrl,s.`ShareTitle`,s.`ShareContent` ,s.`PraiseCount`,s.`CommentCount`,IFNULL(m.`Name`,'花心匿名用户') AS User_Name,s.`CreationDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(s.`CreationDate`) AS CreationDateTicks <%= ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `TB_MB_Comment` c WHERE c.`Source_ID`=s.ID AND c.`Source_Type`=1 AND c.`Comment_Type`=2 AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Comment_User_ID`=@@User_ID@@) AS MyPraiseCount %> ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.`AttachmentUrl`) FROM `TB_MB_ShareAttmnt` AS a WHERE a.`Source_ID`=s.`ID` AND a.`Status`=TRUE AND a.`Attmnt_Type`=1) AS AttachUrls ,m.`ImageUrl` AS User_Image FROM `TB_MB_Share` AS s JOIN `TB_MB_MemberInfo` AS m ON s.`User_ID`=m.`ID` WHERE s.`Status`=TRUE AND m.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND s.`ID`> @@MaxID@@%> <%= AND s.`ID`< @@MinID@@%> ORDER BY s.CreationDate DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>;

SELECT c.ID as CommentID,c.`Comment_Content`,c.`Comment_User_ID`,c.`Accept_Comment_User_ID`,IFNULL(m.`Name`,'花心匿名用户') AS User_Name ,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(c.`CreationDate`) AS CreationDateTicks ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.`AttachmentUrl`) FROM `TB_MB_ShareAttmnt` AS a WHERE a.`Source_ID`=c.`ID` AND a.`Status`=TRUE AND a.`Attmnt_Type`=2) AS AttachUrls ,m.`ImageUrl` AS Comment_User_Image,c.`Comment_Type` FROM `TB_MB_Comment` c JOIN `TB_MB_MemberInfo` AS m ON c.`Comment_User_ID` = m.`ID` WHERE c.`Source_ID`=@@Source_ID@@ AND c.`Source_Type`=1 AND c.`Comment_Type` in (1,2) AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND m.`Status`=TRUE ORDER BY c.ID DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@EndSize@@%>;
<%= SELECT COUNT(0) AS MyPraiseCount FROM `TB_MB_Comment` c WHERE c.`Source_ID`=@@Source_ID@@ AND c.`Source_Type`=1 AND c.`Comment_Type`=2 AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Comment_User_ID`=@@User_ID@@;%>

SELECT s.`ID` AS ShareID,s.`User_ID`,s.`Source_ID`,s.`Source_Type`,s.ShareUrl,s.`ShareTitle`,s.`ShareContent` ,s.`PraiseCount`,s.`CommentCount`,IFNULL(m.`Name`,'花心匿名用户') AS User_Name,s.`CreationDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(s.`CreationDate`) AS CreationDateTicks <%= ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `TB_MB_Comment` c WHERE c.`Source_ID`=s.ID AND c.`Source_Type`=1 AND c.`Comment_Type`=2 AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Comment_User_ID`=@@MyUser_ID@@) AS MyPraiseCount %> ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.`AttachmentUrl`) FROM `TB_MB_ShareAttmnt` AS a WHERE a.`Source_ID`=s.`ID` AND a.`Status`=TRUE AND a.`Attmnt_Type`=1) AS AttachUrls ,m.`ImageUrl` AS User_Image FROM `TB_MB_Share` AS s JOIN `TB_MB_MemberInfo` AS m ON s.`User_ID`=m.`ID` WHERE s.`Status`=TRUE AND m.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND s.`ID`> @@MaxID@@%> <%= AND s.`ID`< @@MinID@@%><%= AND s.`User_ID`=@@User_ID@@%> ORDER BY s.CreationDate DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>;

SELECT s.`ID` AS ShareID,s.`User_ID`,s.`Source_ID`,s.`Source_Type`,s.ShareUrl,s.`ShareTitle`,s.`ShareContent` ,s.`PraiseCount`,s.`CommentCount`,IFNULL(m.`Name`,'花心匿名用户') AS User_Name,s.`CreationDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(s.`CreationDate`) AS CreationDateTicks <%= ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `TB_MB_Comment` c WHERE c.`Source_ID`=s.ID AND c.`Source_Type`=1 AND c.`Comment_Type`=2 AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Comment_User_ID`=@@MyUser_ID@@) AS MyPraiseCount %> ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.`AttachmentUrl`) FROM `TB_MB_ShareAttmnt` AS a WHERE a.`Source_ID`=s.`ID` AND a.`Status`=TRUE AND a.`Attmnt_Type`=1) AS AttachUrls ,m.`ImageUrl` AS User_Image FROM `TB_MB_Share` AS s JOIN `TB_MB_MemberInfo` AS m ON s.`User_ID`=m.`ID` WHERE s.`Status`=TRUE AND m.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND s.`ID`> @@MaxID@@%> <%= AND s.`ID`< @@MinID@@%> AND s.IsHot=TRUE ORDER BY s.HotSort desc ,s.CreationDate DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>;

SELECT c.ID as CommentID,c.`Comment_Content`,c.`Comment_User_ID`,c.`Accept_Comment_User_ID`,IFNULL(m.`Name`,'花心匿名用户') AS User_Name ,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(c.`CreationDate`) AS CreationDateTicks ,m.`ImageUrl` AS Comment_User_Image,c.`Comment_Type`,s.ShareContent,(SELECT a.`AttachmentUrl` FROM `TB_MB_ShareAttmnt` AS a WHERE a.`Source_ID`=s.`ID` AND a.`Status`=TRUE AND a.`Attmnt_Type`=1 LIMIT 0,1) AS ShareImage,c.Source_ID as ShareID FROM `TB_MB_Comment` c left join `TB_MB_Share` s ON c.Source_ID=s.ID JOIN `TB_MB_MemberInfo` AS m ON c.`Comment_User_ID` = m.`ID` WHERE c.Accept_Comment_User_ID=@@User_ID@@ AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND m.`Status`=TRUE AND c.IsRemind=TRUE AND c.Source_Type=1 ORDER BY c.ID DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@EndSize@@%>;
UPDATE `TB_MB_Comment` c SET c.IsRemind=FALSE,c.ModificationUser=@@ModificationUser@@,c.ModificationDate=NOW() WHERE c.Accept_Comment_User_ID=@@User_ID@@ AND c.IsRemind=TRUE AND c.Source_Type=1;
